    READ all the CinemaShowTime in array list by getAllCinemaShowTimeList() Store into an array list of CinemaShowTime if CinemaShowTime's Cinema Code matches return empty array list if no CinemaShowTime exist for that Cinema Code

    READ all the CinemaShowTime in array list by getAllCinemaShowTimeList() Check if the CinemaShowTime's Cinema belong to the Cineplex Store into an array list of CinemaShowTime if it does return empty array list if no CinemaShowTime exist for that Cineplex

    READ all the CinemaShowTime in array list by getAllCinemaShowTimeList() Store into an array list of CinemaShowTime if CinemaShowTime's Movie ID matches return empty array list if no CinemaShowTime exist for that Movie ID
